content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][vc_single_image image=”1449″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

ABOUT +POSITIVE

[vc_column_text]

+Positive is a charity project from Pulse Active, which is focusing on making a long-term impact by helping children in need. We are aiming to build incredible playspaces that give every kid a chance to thrive physically, socially and emotionally.

[/vc_column_text]

PULSE ACTIVE EMBRACES AND ASPIRES...

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Happiness
  • Determination
  • Challenge
  • Success
  • Passion
  • Boldness

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Freedom to express
  • Creativity
  • Innovation
  • Respect
  • Personal Growth
  • Integrity

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]

HOW CAN +POSITIVE HELP?

[vc_column_text]

  • Support on raising funds
  • Amplify awareness for selected projects in Pulse Active’s events and channels
  • Be a connection point between brands/companies and projects/organizations
  • Connect volunteers and people of interest with projects/organizations
  • Support on negotiating goods in need for organizations from companies
  • Participate in the programs

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

WHOM ARE WE SUPPORTING?

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_separator style=”dashed”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”10/12″]

''It's not about being the best or biggest. More importantly is about doing the greatest we can and do the best with the power we have''

Mr. Bady PhamCo Founder & Managing Director
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
